H0.text: Virus is composed of many cells.

H1.text: Bacterium is composed of many cells.

H2.text: Paramecium is composed of many cells.

H3.text: Plants are composed of many cells.

A5.text: Plant cells differentiate into multiple cell types, forming tissues such as the vascular tissue with specialized xylem and phloem of leaf veins and stems, and organs with different physiological functions.
